Pricing

Pick a plan in minutes, scale with confidence later

A simple entry for B2C users and a structured procurement path for B2B buyers.

Individual

For solo operators and personal automation

$0 /month
Start Free
  • Up to 1,000 runs/month
  • 5 integrations
  • Basic analytics
  • Community support
  • 7-day history
Most Popular

Team

For growing teams that need control and velocity

$49 /seat/month
Try 14 Days
  • Up to 50,000 runs/month
  • Unlimited integrations
  • Advanced analytics
  • Shared workflows
  • Email/chat support
  • 90-day history
  • API access

Enterprise

For organizations with advanced governance requirements

Custom
Contact Sales
  • Unlimited runs
  • All Team features
  • SSO and RBAC placeholders
  • Audit log placeholders
  • Dedicated support placeholders
  • Custom integrations
  • Contracted SLA placeholders
  • Procurement support

Feature Comparison

Compare plan-level capabilities across B2C and B2B needs.

Feature Individual Team Enterprise
Monthly Runs 1,000 50,000 Unlimited
Integrations 5 Unlimited Unlimited + Custom
Seats 1 Unlimited Unlimited
Analytics Basic Advanced Custom
API Access No Yes Yes
SSO No No Planned
RBAC No Basic Advanced (Planned)
Audit Logs No No Planned
History Window 7 days 90 days Custom
Support Community Email/Chat Dedicated (Planned)
Billing Card Card Invoice (Planned)
SLA N/A 99.9% Placeholder 99.99% Placeholder

B2B Purchase Flow

Contract, billing, and PoC flow placeholders for enterprise procurement.

1

Discovery & Quote

Align team scope, objectives, and legal/procurement constraints.

2

PoC Validation

Run a scoped pilot to validate fit, reliability, and workflows.

3

Contract & Billing

Finalize commercial terms and map invoice or card billing path.

4

Rollout & Support

Enable teams and monitor adoption with staged governance checkpoints.

Pricing FAQ

The most common launch-stage pricing and billing questions.

Is there a free plan?

Yes. Individual includes a free entry plan with placeholder usage limits and core workflow features.

Can I switch between monthly and yearly billing?

Yes. Billing cadence can be switched from the account workspace settings placeholder.

How are additional seats billed?

Team pricing scales per seat with placeholder volume discounts at higher tiers.

How do we start Enterprise?

Use the sales contact path to scope procurement, security review, and rollout milestones.

Do you offer refunds?

Refund and cancellation policy is placeholder in v1 and should be finalized before public launch.

Is PoC available for B2B buyers?

Yes. Enterprise flow includes a PoC stage before contract commitment.

Can we pay by invoice?

Enterprise billing supports invoice placeholders and custom contract terms.

Do you support regional data controls?

Regional controls are placeholder in this release and can be listed as planned capability.

Need help choosing?

Start as an individual or speak with sales for a structured enterprise plan.
